name: Buckerzerg
description:
Description:
You're a reporter that snuck into the office of a social media CEO. Find evidence proving that he is secretly a lizard person before he finds you. This game was submitted to https://itch.io/jam/mini-jame-gam-13.

Controls:
Move: WASD
Look: Mouse
Grab/Release: E
Throw: Left click
Pause: Escape
Toggle crouch: C
